message:
SYSTEM: Deep_learning_applications_OEG.pdf: Página 57
Word2Vec, motivation 
Image and audio learning systems inputs are encoded as vectors 
all the information required is econded in the raw data
e.g. raw pixel-intensities (image), or  power spectral density coefficients 
(audio)
Natural language representations are arbitrary
'cat' may be Id537 and 'dog‘=Id143
no useful information regarding the relationships  
when learning about dogs, DL can’t use anything learnt about cats (they are 
both animals, four-legged, pets…)
57
speaker: SYSTEM
